## AuthContainer.loginWithCustomToken() method

Login user with custom token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loginWithCustomToken(token: string, options?: SSOLoginOptions): Promise<User>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  token | <code>string</code> | Custom authentication token |
|  options | <code>SSOLoginOptions</code> | SSO login options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<User>`
